name: Jakarta - Matsuyama: Poems #1 of 10
description:
Jakarta - Matsuyama. Two cities and all the joy, sorrow, and hopeful naivety that comes with. Let's take another trip down memory lane and revisit some optimism, resiliency, unrequited love, regret, guilt, dreams, place names, digital signs, a world before great recession of 2008, advertising hoardings, the voices of market traders, animals, plants, you, and me, and a space to sing the praises and frustrations of the cities we live in.

We’re here carried by a strong current of wistful longing for a time in the past; a tinge of sadness because you know you can’t have that exact things again.
